DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine pharmacokinetics bioequivalence amlodipine besylate formulation feed condition .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalency Study Amlodipine Besylate Tablets , 10 mg Dr. Reddy 's Under Fed Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate pharmacokinetics bioequivalence Amlodipine Tablets 10 mg Dr. Reddy 's versus Norvasc 10 mg tablet administer 1 x 10 mg tablet healthy volunteer washout period 14 day .
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject 18 45 year age inclusive . Informed nature study give write informed consent . Have body weight within 15 % appropriate range define 1983 Metropolitan Life Company table weigh least 115 ( Appendix I Appendix II ) . If female , subject lactate positive pregnancy test screen prior three treatment period . Females must use medically acceptable method contraception throughout entire study period one week study complete . Medically acceptable method contraception may use subject and/or partner : oral contraceptive , progestin injection implant , condom spermicide , diaphragm spermicide , IUD , vaginal spermicidal suppository , surgical sterilization partner abstinence . Females take oral contraceptive must take consistently least three month prior receive study medication . Hypersensitivity amlodipine besylate ( NorvascÂ® ) relate calcium channel blocker ) . Any history clinical condition might affect drug absorption , metabolism excretion . Recent history mental illness , drug addiction , drug abuse alcoholism . Donation great 500 ml blood past 4 week prior study dose difficulty donate blood . Received investigational drug within 4 week prior study dose . Currently take prescription medication , except oral contraceptive , within 7 day prior study dose overthecounter medication within 3 day study dose . This prohibition include vitamin herbal preparation take nutritional supplement nontherapeutic indication judge attend physician . Regular tobacco use 6 month prior study dose .
